about:
Hello! I am Dung Nguyen, Software Engineer from Hanoi, Vietnam.


 An experienced software developer, with many years of experience working in programming in the fields of finance, forex, cryptocurrency as well as accounting, healthcare and medicine.


 I like working on side projects to improve my skills and learn new things. I am mainly proficient in Back-end development, can do many programming languages such as Java, C#, Nodejs and Solidity. I also learned about Web technologies like React and built several projects using it, including this website.
